title: SOLD T206 Bob Spade - SGC40 Principe De Gales Back
author: ibuysportsephemera

posts.post_title: SOLD T206 Bob Spade - SGC40 Principe De Gales Back
posts.post_content:
I have for sale a very nice T206 1909-11 Bob Spade El Principe De Gales back.  It is graded SGC 40 VG 3.  I do not sell many cards and don't have access to any price guides, so I am not really sure of a good asking price.  That being said...eBay has some comps (but not exact) so I am asking [strike]$old [/strike] now $old delivered.  Please PM me if interested....I will consider all reasonable offers so don't be shy.  

Thanks,

Jeff

Jeff,

PM sent.  Email me at [url]bdrownbaseball@gmail.com[/url].  Thanks, Bill

[quote name="BBT206" post=1773136]Jeff,

PM sent.  Email me at [URL="bdrownbaseball@gmail.com"]bdrownbaseball@gmail.com[/URL].  Thanks, Bill[/quote]


Thanks Bill...I replied.  The only thing that I would trade for is memorabilia...publications, photos, ticket stubs, etc.

Jeff

SOLD -Thanks to the members who reached out to me to help me price this.  I have been given values of $110, $125 and $150.  I will go in the middle here and offer the card at $old delivered or reasonable offer.  Please PM if interested.

Thanks,

Jeff
